title: 400 RP at Summoner Level 3
body: Does anyone know what happened to the 400 RP they gave as a leveling reward? I just noticed but I've yet to receive it yet. And I'm currently lv. 17 on a new account (not smurf, I deleted my old accounts and decided to come back to league, so made new account). Just wondering if it's still there cause it would be nice to have a lil bit of extra RP during all this Project stuff released. Thanks.

replies.body: When hextech crafting released, the RP provided for new accounts was actually replaced with a [new player chest](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp).  This chest will provide some free content as well as help introduce you to hextech crafting.  If you haven't received one, please reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll be happy to look into this.  Hope that helps!
Oh okay, that helps a lot. Thank You!
